name: Vacuum Balaena
description:
Take a short while and enter in an underwater world and embody a whale named Melouchax. Explore the depth of the ocean, and try to  answer to your own needs, which are : breathin' and eatin' fishes. But be careful to not eat different kind of trash which draws into  swarm of fishes, or you're going to accumulate to much CO2 inside you. 

This game exists thanks to the NUPES Game Jam. During 32 hours we work on it, we also pick the theme which is about the pollution and how critical it is.  Let's introduce :  Tech Artist - Programmer :  Exyde / Sly  3D Graphist - Anim : Nolwenn ARMAND  2D - UI artist : Louis PICARD  Sound Designer :   LoupAvecU:nP Game Designer - Level Designer - Level Art :   Marleine   / Waves   Game Designer - Programmer : Rubens FOURNIER GD - ND : Lucie CHARIOT  Exterior helper : Lucas LUBIENICKI, Morgane LALONDE, Tristan KHAM , Djene  Enjoy !
